name: The Official GamingTaylor Game, Great Job!
description: The world renowned GamingTaylor brings you an action packed first person 3D Zombie Shooter! A once great castle has been infected by the plague, it is up to you to clear out the zombie horde!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
